triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: Path planning is a computational problem to find optimal paths, fundamental to the paper's work on UAV navigation.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper develops path planning and formation control specifically for multi-UAV systems.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Lyapunov functions are used to analyze the stability of the proposed formation control system.

triples.name: Robot control
triples.relevance: Robot control principles underpin the formation and path planning control methods developed in the paper.

triples.name: Artificial potential field
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an improved artificial potential field (IAPF) method that uses a rotating potential field to escape local minima.
